name: OneChanbara SPECIAL
description:
An exhilarating and pleasant grotesque action "Onechanbara" that jumps into a flock of zombies and slashes with Bassabassa.
If you take a return blood, the screen will be dyed and the character's blood will be awakened.
Use your sword to slash the arms and neck of the zombies that attack you, and connect the "cool combo" that launches attacks at high speed from enemy to enemy to destroy the zombie swarm at once.
